Sentencas: The integrity of metallic interconnectors (MICs) in a solid oxide cell stack is crucial because contact resistances or limitations in gas supply may occur.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: In this contribution, a Crofer 22 APU (R) interconnector with a (Mn, Co, Fe)3O4 spinel oxide (MCO) coating and a lanthanum-strontium-manganese-cobalt oxide (LSMC) contact layer at the air side was investigated.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: The electrochemical behavior was characterized by means of IV-characteristics, impedance spectroscopy and DRT analysis.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: In particular, the contact losses at the air side were measured with targeted potential probes.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: With respect to the contact layer mounted in a dried state, the application of a stack-like clamping pressure of 1 MPa showed a significant decrease of the contact resistance.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: In order to extend an existing zero-dimensional performance model for an electrolyte-supported cell with a Ni/GDC fuel electrode and LSCF air electrode, a method was established to parameterize contact losses at the air electrode.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: The observed activation energy of the contact losses showed to be independent of the clamping pressure.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: Additionally, the dependency of the cell ' s intrinsic ohmic losses towards the steam partial pressure at the Ni/GDC fuel electrode was quantified and included to the model.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling

Sentencas: Simulation studies were validated with experimental data for technical operating conditions.
Titulo: Stack-like Contacting in Solid Oxide Cells: Electrochemical Characterization and Modeling
